name: Edinbaah
description:
The city of Edinburgh has been overrun with sheep!

The mayor is hosting a sheep-gathering contest to elect the official sheep-gathering company of the city, and you'll be participating!

You're in for frantic driving and jumping above sheep to collect them, as well as fighting against determined contestants. Can you defeat them all and win the competition? Only one way to find out!



The Team

  • Design: DUREL Victor - JAUGEY Lisa - COQUIDE Clément - KOENIG Hugo - GUILLOME Romain - NOUARI Zineddine
  • Art: Andréas TIMOTEO BANNIS - Eve-Anne CARTON - Romane WEISS - Camille BOUCHER - Alyssia GALLEZE - Antonin ROBINOT - Charlotte CLEMENT - Coline MULLER - Maélis LEVASTRE
  • Dev: Chakib BENSSOUM - Jean JUILLARD - Léonard FETIS - Guillaume Hitier
